# handlebars-regexp
RegExp Handlebars helpers.

## Install
```sh
$ npm install handlebars-regexp --save
```
*Mac / Linux users may need to run with `sudo`*.

*documented by [jsdoc-to-markdown](https://github.com/75lb/jsdoc-to-markdown)*
